full_text:
Jason Momoa’s take on Aquaman still manages to work for me on every level and I don’t know why. Amber Heard’s Mera was also pretty great.

Also yeah, James Wan was definitely the best pick for that. Let him keep doing Aquaman flicks please.

full_text:
I saw Aquaman last night:
1) Jason Momoa can’t act, but he did a good job for not being able to act
2) Thank god the underwater scenes were stunning, because that DC green screen is trash. Y’all couldn’t rent a light house?
3) Amber Heard was the best part
4) Manta was WACK

full_text: #Aquaman is fucking batshit insane. In a good way. Yes, it's cheesy. And Momoa and Amber Heard are...limited actors, true. But the movie is so much damn fun, with SO much cool visual imagination on display. It throws everything at the wall, and they spared no expense.
